summary: Add support for interceptors to the PHP SDK for context propagation, authorization, and instrumentation use cases, following patterns from other Temporal SDKs.
userImpact: Users cannot implement cross-cutting concerns like distributed tracing, authorization checks, and context propagation in PHP workflows.
proposedFix: Implement interceptor pattern following reference implementations from other Temporal SDKs.
resolutionDetails: Implemented in version 2.7 release as indicated by comment from wolfy-j.
keyQuote: Can use any of the other SDKs as reference. The main uses for interceptors are context propagation, authorization and instrumentation.
